attributes.title: What is This Wonder-Filled Universe? || Shiva Sutras || 26 Jan 2005
attributes.description:
Name Of The Program : Shiva Sutras
Session on: What Is This Wonder-Filled Universe?
Date : 26 January 2005
Venue : Adikailaasa, Bengaluru, India

In this video The Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism HDH #Nithyananda Paramashivam narrates the scenario when #Devi Parashakti is asking Sri Paramshiva "What Is This Wonder-Filled #Universe?" This program was conducted on 26 January 2005 in Adikailaasa, Bengaluru,India.
